tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Takes the modified file and puts it in the feature branch into local repository.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Check if particular product is locked.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Locks the product and all repository entity records used by it.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: The operator makes 1 or more intermediary changes and saves them.
post.description: Export product file and productRepo file. Add files in local feature branch. Each intermediary save is a separate commit in the feature branch.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Create a new product with first version.
post.description: If product already exist create a new version.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Push feature branch in remote repository.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Starts change workflow for product with productCode and productVersion.
post.description: Creates feature branch with name feature/productCode_productVersion.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Unlocks the product and all repository entity records used by it.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Transfer the product lock to another user.

parameters.name: transferLockToUser
parameters.description: The username to transfer the product lock to

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Checks for differences in all files that are bound to particular product

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Imports product in dev environment from tag with tag name producCode_productVersion_productStatus.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Export from DB the modified product and repository files and puts them in the export database folder.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Imports product from tag with tag name producCode_productVersion_productStatus.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Creates tag with tagName, checkouts the tag and push it.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
get.summary: Merges feature branch into master and deletes the feature branch.

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.summary: Export from DB the modified product and repository files and puts them in the local feature branch .

tags: Insis configurator change management workflow services
post.description: If product version is null get max version and add 1.

tags: Insis configurator services for import of product and repository
post.summary: Service is used to import configuration of a product.
post.description: File structure must be according productConfiguration.xsd. Service has mandatory parameter of type FormDataMultiPart, containg field with name 'file'.  Service gets a form data body part given a control name "file". 'file' is a body key for the request.

tags: Insis configurator services for import of product and repository
post.summary: Service is used to import repository configuration
post.description: File structure must be according configuratorRepository.xsd. Service has mandatory parameter of type FormDataMultiPart, containg field with name 'file'.  Service gets a form data body part given a control name "file". 'file' is a body key for the request.

tags: Insis configurator services for import of product and repository
post.summary: Initialize INSIS Product Configurator from snapshot.

200.description: INSIS Product Configuration was initialize from snapshot
